Title: theme generator for WPF
Description: thematic is a theme generator for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications. By choosing a few colors and a design you can generate a WPF theme assembly that is completely separate from your application code.
HomeWiki:
You can run thematic directly from here (installs via ClickOnce)

The Problem: Creating a custom theme for your WPF application, such as selecting colors and creating custom control templates and styles can be a long and complicated process, especially for smaller teams without dedicated design skills.

The Solution: Thematic helps you to fast-track this by letting you choose from a number of groups of custom control templates and styles, and then choose colors that match your company, project or campaign. Then you can generate this out as a running Visual Studio solution, with the theme and style information factored out nicely into a separate DLL.
